pages.text: A state-of-your-art blast furnace, which consumes [#](e16201)Orange Ink[#]() to smelt ores and the like.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Supplying a Knowledge Gem(book://magical_items/knowledge_gem) allows you to automatically collect XP while smelting.

pages.name: Cinderhearth Structure
pages.text: The Cinderhearth's abilities can be enhanced via [Upgrades](book://magical_blocks/upgrades). Place them on the two Chiseled Blocks.

pages.title: Block Checklist
pages.text: - 1 Cinderhearth\- 21 Polished Blocks\- 6 Crest Blocks\- 5 Glass-like Blocks\- 2 Chiseled Blocks\- 6 Buckets of Lava\\_Did it really need that [#](bb00bb)Lava[#]() underneath since you already have [#](e16201)Ink[#]()? No, not really. But it looks so much better._

pages.title: Upgrades
pages.text: [Upgrades](book://magical_blocks/upgrades) placed on the [#](bb00bb)Chiseled Blocks[#]() do not work automatically, but requires you to supply an additional type of Ink(book://magic/ink) to the Cinderhearth. The higher the upgrades, the higher the consumption.

- Speed ([#](aa32a0)Magenta Ink[#]()):\faster smelt times\- Yield ([#](258ac8)Light Blue Ink[#]()):\chance to multiply the output for most blocks\- Experience ([#](641f9c)Purple Ink[#]()):\vastly increases experience gain\- Efficiency ([#](000000)Black Ink[#]()):\greatly decreases Ink consumption of the other types, including [#](e16201)Orange[#]()
